coding_practice.title: Divide Array in Sets of K Consecutive Numbers
coding_practice.description:
Given an array of integers nums and a positive integer k, check whether it is possible to divide this array into sets of k consecutive numbers.

Return true if it is possible. Otherwise, return false.

examples.explanation: Array can be divided into [1,2,3,4] and [3,4,5,6].
Array can be divided into [1,2,3] , [2,3,4] , [3,4,5] and [9,10,11].
Each array should be divided in subarrays of size 3.

coding_practice.note: This question is the same as 846
coding_practice.explanation:
1. 先檢查 nums 的長度是否能被 k 整除，否則無法平均分組。
2. 使用 Counter 計算每個數字出現次數，並從最小的數字開始建立連續序列。
3. 對每個出現次數大於 0 的數字，嘗試組成 [num, num+1, ..., num+k-1] 的組。
4. 若任何數字不足以組成該序列則回傳 False，全部組成成功則回傳 True。
